name: "The Bird Approaches" - I Could Have Done That #12/70
description: "And we could see the bird approaching from afar ... " #12 of the "I Could Have Done That" series. Don't you hate it when people look at art and say, "I could have done that!" :/ These are all 1-of-1 high-resolution scans of 70 simple acrylic paintings with a little animation made by me, Kris Kanaly (aka Pyramid Guy). All of the physical paintings have been collected. These are certified authentic NFTs minted by me. Only one copy will be minted of all 70 paintings. Follow me on Instagram: @pyramidguy. And check out my other cool project, the Galactibles™ at galactibles.xyz. For paintings in IRL: kriskanaly.com
